name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: At a young age, I was interested in comic books, which was really how I learnt to read. The name Cage came from a comic book character called Power Man.
name: Nicolas Cage

quote: There is a certain age at which a child looks at you in all earnestness and delivers a long, pleased speech in all the true inflections of spoken English, but with not one recognizable syllable.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: I can't wait to be that age and hanging out with a bunch of people hanging out all day playing golf and going to the beach, all my own age. We'd be laughing and having a good time and getting loopy on our prescription drugs. Driving golf carts around. I can't wait.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I would love a family. I'm at the age where the wish for a child gets stronger. But who knows.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I love physical kinds of comedy and getting down and dirty and doing stunts. When I was growing up, I was always getting into fights with guys and usually punching out boys my age because I was a lot bigger and tougher. So I'm naturally accustomed to putting myself into the headspace of a girl who can take care of herself.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: Love, with very young people, is a heartless business. We drink at that age from thirst, or to get drunk it is only later in life that we occupy ourselves with the individuality of our wine.
name: Isak Dinesen

quote: Age for me is just a number.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: You hit a certain age and - especially because of TV - the young cooks coming up say, 'You're a sellout, because you're doing something other than what you should be doing.' 'Top Chef' is a double-edged sword for me: There's a whole group of people who will not come to the restaurants because they assume I'm not in them anymore, all I do is TV.
name: Tom Colicchio

quote: Some of your teachers are actually closer in age to you than you think.
name: Maya Lin

quote: From an early age I didn't buy into the value systems of working hard in a nine-to-five job. I thought creativity, friendship and loyalty and pushing the boundaries of what was acceptable was much more interesting.
name: Adam Clayton

quote: I didn't have any success in show business until I was 30 to 31 years of age.
name: Adam Carolla

quote: I hate the idea that you shouldn't wear something just because you're a certain age.
name: Miuccia Prada

quote: I am firmly of the opinion that women who make a lot of effort to hang onto their looks in middle age (unless they are beauties, entertainers or prostitutes) are rather sad, as one should surely have something more substantial to recommend one by this time, such as kindness or cleverness.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: As a precocious teen I dreamed of being Graham Greene. Well, as it turned out, I never wrote a great novel, sadly, and I never converted to Catholicism, happily, but I did do one thing he did. That is, in middle age I moved to a seaside town and got into a right barney with the local powers-that-be.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: Age should not have its face lifted, but it should rather teach the world to admire wrinkles as the etchings of experience and the firm line of character.
name: Clarence Day

quote: Age is only a number, a cipher for the records. A man can't retire his experience. He must use it. Experience achieves more with less energy and time.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: To me, old age is always fifteen years older than I am.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: I wear clothes that most people in the Midwest would probably deem inappropriate at my age. And I rock a bikini all summer long. I know that it's not normal, but I just don't care. I live once.
name: Liz Phair

quote: I've lost touch with a lot of that boutique-type music just because of my age, and raising my son and the multiple jobs I have at this point.
name: Liz Phair

quote: There's no way to approach anything in an objective way. We're completely subjective our view of the world is completely controlled by who we are as human beings, as men or women, by our age, our history, our profession, by the state of the world.
name: Charlie Kaufman

quote: Age is not measured by years. Nature does not equally distribute energy. Some people are born old and tired while others are going strong at seventy.
name: Dorothy Thompson

quote: Maybe it is something to do with age, but I have become fonder of poetry than of prose.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: When I was younger, my whole sense of self-worth was based on whether or not I was working, which was awful. And I had a baby at 20 years old, so it wasn't just about me. At around the age of 30 there was a stretch where I wasn't working - certainly not on anything I liked, anyway - and I started to do other things.
name: Kiefer Sutherland

quote: I grew up on the golden age of children's TV.
name: Edward Norton

quote: I do wish I could tell you my age but it's impossible. It keeps changing all the time.
name: Greer Garson

quote: Pretend to be dumb, that's the only way to reach old age.
name: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: The excitement of learning separates youth from old age. As long as you're learning you're not old.
name: Rosalyn S. Yalow

quote: The history of my life must begin by the earliest circumstance which my memory can evoke it will therefore commence when I had attained the age of eight years and four months.
name: Giacomo Casanova

quote: We are in an electronic technology age now and it's about time we put away the old stuff.
name: Monica Edwards

quote: At the age of 20 I bought a used Fiat 127. This was the only one I could afford!
name: Carlos Ghosn

quote: At my age, I don't think anyone is untouched by cancer.
name: Bryan Cranston

quote: We try, we fail, we posture, we aspire, we pontificate - and then we age, shrink, die, and vanish.
name: George Saunders

quote: My habit would have been to veer towards the dark - to prove I was something edgy, or maybe to prove that I was cognisant of the dark side. Now, with age and confidence, I can say, yeah, that's true, but I am cognisant of the fact that people can do things well. And can be more loving than you expect.
name: George Saunders

quote: It is not possible to live in this age if you don't have a sense of many contradictory forces.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: I'm very accepting with my age. It's like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you've become comfortable in your skin.
name: Zoe Saldana

quote: You need some insecurity if you're an actor. It keeps the pot boiling. I haven't yet started to think about retiring. I was shocked when I heard about Paul Newman retiring at age 82. Most actors just fade away like old soldiers.
name: Al Pacino

quote: It's hard for women at my age in Hollywood, but I'm not discouraged.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: We're still living with the old paradigm of age as an arch. That's the old metaphor: You're born, you peak at midlife and decline into decrepitude.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: We can no longer waste time and money. Every day, more than 2,000 girls in America, age 15-19, give birth - in the wealthiest, most educated nation in the world! Neither you nor I should accept this statistic.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: The reality is sobering: in the United States one in three girls will become pregnant before age 20, totaling more than 750,000 girls per year.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: I am hoping for peaceful transition into a new age. Obama has already played a great role in initiating us into that vision. If he were to be harmed in any way, it would spawn the birth of a million Obamas.
name: Saul Williams

quote: I definitely don't look my age. So I actively look for roles that will help people change their perception of me.
name: Elijah Wood

quote: The age thing really bugs me. Do people have more of a right to not like what I say because I'm 19?
name: Fiona Apple

quote: There are a lot of downsides to being male. We age faster and die younger. But give us this: we're lifetime baby-making machines. Women's reproductive abilities start to wane when they're as young as 35. Men? We're good to go pretty much till we're dead.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: Older fatherhood isn't all bad: testosterone rates drop about 1% per year as men age, making them less reactive and more patient, and a professionally established middle-aged man is likely to have more time and money to devote to his kids than a twenty-something who's just getting started.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: Credit or debit cards, for starters, are nothing short of shoppers' Novocain. Even in the age of digital purchases and virtual money, we still attach a special value to dirty paper with pictures of presidents on it. Handing some of that to a cashier simply hurts more than handing over a little sliver of plastic.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: When it comes to raising civilized kids there are no hard rules, but there are two things on which most parents agree: Boys are generally wilder than girls, and adolescents are wilder than kids of any other age. If you've got an adolescent boy, you're in the sweet spot for trouble.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: It seems to me there is a change in what audiences want to see. I can only hope that's correct, because there's an awful lot of people of my age around now and we outnumber the others.
name: Maggie Smith

quote: A truly great book should be read in youth, again in maturity and once more in old age, as a fine building should be seen by morning light, at noon and by moonlight.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: In Hollywood, you play a mom, and the next thing you know, you're on 'The Golden Girls.' They age you so fast.
name: Gabrielle Union

quote: A great age of literature is perhaps always a great age of translations.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: I can't get my knickers in a twist about my age and ageing in an industry that caters to the ids of 14-year-olds.
name: Vera Farmiga

quote: I was living on the wrong side of the tracks in Evanston, Illinois, in a home for boys. We had these Jackson 5 records. I really related to their voices - they were about my age, but they were doing it.
name: Eddie Vedder

quote: By age seven, I used to comb my hair for performances, just pull my hair up into a bun. Granted, it wasn't a very intricate hairstyle. Still, to be that responsible and disciplined at age seven is unusual.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: It begins and ends with money. It's absurd in this day and age when we need so much money for education, health, for people, that a $100 million dollars can be spent on a film. It's obscene.
name: Kathleen Turner

quote: I am at that age when you panic at the slightest thing.
name: Rupert Everett

quote: Being gay and being a woman has one big thing in common, which is that we both become invisible after the age of 42. Who wants a gay 50-year-old? No one, let me tell you.
name: Rupert Everett

quote: I began to speak well at a very advanced age - 15, 16, 17 years old. It was psychological: the trauma of war, my family and growing up on my own. I was more or less a street kid.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: We Jews have a special attachment to the Book. The study of page after page in tomes yellowing with age was obligatory.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: Having come to live in this age is as though one were to have entered another country. Learn its language or risk being left out.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: I don't want to look at other people my age in leather. Why would I put it on?
name: George Michael

quote: I believe that the fight against crime starts in the home. Parents must take responsibility for their children and show them love and guidance from an early age so they learn to respect the rights of others.
name: Blanche Lincoln

quote: At an early age, I started my own paper route. Once I saw how you could service people and do a good job and get paid for it, I just wanted to be the best I could be in whatever I did.
name: Puff Daddy

quote: Middle age: when you begin to exchange your emotions for symptoms.
name: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: Brain power improves by brain use, just as our bodily strength grows with exercise. And there is no doubt that a large proportion of the female population, from school days to late middle age, now have very complicated lives indeed.
name: A. N. Wilson

quote: I began to understand my sensations, to know what I wanted, at around the age of forty - but only vaguely.
name: Camille Pissarro

quote: I grew up on a farm in a small town where you do or say one thing and everybody knows about it. You see it happen, there's always the town gossip - 'Oh did you hear about so and so, or did you hear what went on in this household?' So I learned at a very young age just to keep my mouth shut.
name: Garrett Hedlund

quote: If you love somebody, you love them. My parents had a 25-year age gap between them and my mum was the breadwinner, my dad the house husband. I'm a strong believer that a good relationship can work, whatever the situation.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: The Border Ballads, for instance, and the Robin Hood Ballads, clearly suppose a state of society which is nothing but a very circumscribed and not very important heroic age.
name: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: By the age of 9 or 10, I knew that I had to cut my own cloth and make my own way.
name: John le Carre

quote: When you're my age and you see a story, you better go for it pretty quickly. I'd just like to get a few more novels under my belt.
name: John le Carre

quote: Catholics and evangelicals need to remain allied, and in solidarity, against the increasingly aggressive secularism of our age.
name: Gary Bauer

quote: I don't know whether it's age or maturity, but I certainly find myself committed more and more to the looser forms of Western democracy at any price.
name: John le Carre

quote: Losing both parents at a young age gave me a sense that you can't really control life - so you'd better live it while it's here. I stopped believing in a storybook existence a long time ago. All you can do is push in a direction and see what comes of it.
name: Jon Hamm

quote: Old age is not a disease - it is strength and survivorship, triumph over all kinds of vicissitudes and disappointments, trials and illnesses.
name: Maggie Kuhn

quote: I was a very sickly kid. While I was in the hospital at age 7, my Dad brought me a stack of comic books to keep me occupied. I was hooked.
name: Len Wein

quote: Study until twenty-five, investigation until forty, profession until sixty, at which age I would have him retired on a double allowance.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: In the digital age of 'overnight' success stories such as Facebook, the hard slog is easily overlooked.
name: James Dyson

quote: The greatest writers of this age... are aware of the mystery of our existence.
name: J. B. Priestley

quote: The chief role of the universities is to prolong adolescence into middle age, at which point early retirement ensures that we lack the means or the will to enforce significant change.
name: J. G. Ballard

quote: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship. I watched them over the years and saw how they dealt with everything together, as a team.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: My grandparents got married at a very young age, and a lot of what I think about marriage is based on their relationship.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: At my age it is unseemly to be pessimistic.
name: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: I don't know why people are so obsessed with age anyway. I mean, 90 is the new 70 70 is the new 50 and 50 is the new 40 so the whole act-your-age thing? Only up to a point.
name: Joan Collins

quote: I don't look my age, I don't feel my age and I don't act my age. To me age is just a number.
name: Joan Collins

quote: I believe that parents need to make nutrition education a priority in their home environment. It's crucial for good health and longevity to instill in your children sound eating habits from an early age.
name: Cat Cora

quote: Most poetry in the modern age has retreated to the private sphere, turning its back on the political realm.
name: Terry Eagleton

quote: We incorporated new tastes and flavors into our kids' diets from a very early age, which helped to develop their palates and prevented them from becoming picky eaters. We don't buy junk food and give them options of fresh fruit, yogurt, raw almonds, or dried whole grain cereals for snack time.
name: Cat Cora

quote: Filth and old age, I'm sure you will agree, are powerful wardens upon chastity.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: It has been claimed at times that our modern age of technology facilitates dictatorship.
name: Henry A. Wallace

quote: Working on the 'Ice Age' movies, I'm really proud to be in them.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: No Congress ever has seen fit to amend the Constitution to address any issue related to marriage. No Constitutional Amendment was needed to ban polygamy or bigamy, nor was a Constitutional Amendment needed to set a uniform age of majority to ban child marriages.
name: Judy Biggert

quote: We're taught at such a young age that you can always be better and that you're never perfect and that you're never good enough.
name: Shawn Johnson

quote: The young people have MTV and rock and roll. Why would they go to read poetry? Poetry belongs to the Stone Age. It awakens in us perceptions that go back to those times.
name: Robert Morgan

quote: Study is the bane of childhood, the oil of youth, the indulgence of adulthood, and a restorative in old age.
name: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Because of my age and because there's more work on the small screen. What it's missing in quality it makes up for in quantity. From an actor's selfish point of view.
name: Cesar Romero

quote: Old age is an insult. It's like being smacked.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Age puzzles me. I thought it was a quiet time. My seventies were interesting and fairly serene, but my eighties are passionate. I grow more intense as I age.
name: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quote: One of the great challenges of our age, in which the tools of our productivity are also the tools of our leisure, is to figure out how to make more useful those moments of procrastination when we're idling in front of our computer screens.
name: Joshua Foer

quote: I happen to be interested in watching a face age. I like faces of women aging so it makes me personally quite sad. That's a beautiful gift from God. If people don't want to see that anymore then I won't be in anymore movies.
name: Debra Winger

quote: Never say never, but the thought of electively cutting oneself is beyond my grasp, and I also object to it politically. Denying the lines on our faces makes a comment about age and wisdom I don't care to make.
name: Debra Winger

quote: People pay to see movies with women looking beautiful, but I think there will be a place for me to play women looking my own age.
name: Debra Winger

quote: There's a small club of women who are willing to age.
name: Debra Winger

quote: I hope to find the roles that are age appropriate but not yearning to be younger, or parenting ad nauseam.
name: Debra Winger

quote: I try to write lyrics so that they won't age, which sort of leaves you with the big subjects like death and love and sex and violence.
name: Florence Welch

quote: In the modern media age we are rarely surprised by what we see. Whether it's on television or film or in the theatre, everything is so advertised, so trailed, that most entertainment is merely what you thought it was going to be like.
name: Rowan Atkinson

quote: Your 40s are a major trough. About the age of 50, feelings of satisfaction begin to rebound and keep rising into your 50s, 60s and 70s, with health being a major factor.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: I came back to work when my children were two months old. At that early age, they seem to have little awareness of anybody but their Raggedy Ann dolls, so it wasn't a matter of them missing me. I was missing them.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: Being successful at a very young age gave me the confidence and the capability to try out other things.
name: Joshua Lederberg

quote: About the time I turned 50, I experienced the profound biological change that often accompanies women at that age. Also, I put two kids in college and lost both of my parents, so I'm no longer somebody's daughter.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: I feel more mature than most people my age.
name: Leighton Meester

quote: Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles.
name: Estelle Getty

quote: Maybe I'll be a feminist in my old age.
name: Bjork

quote: I feel the 21st century is another new age. Not only can we collaborate again with nature, but we have to. It's an emergency.
name: Bjork

quote: You can fake your age or mask it, but the passion that moves the characters has to be real.
name: Victoria Abril

quote: I think that clearly it has an influence, to be coming of age during the punk rock era, to come from a difficult and sporadically violent background, to have been in and out of such chaos, I think it actually helps. But I don't know for sure.
name: Craig Ferguson

quote: I'd date someone younger or older age doesn't matter to me. Or looks, really - it's all about maturity.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
name: George Sand

quote: I wanted to be a forest ranger or a coal man. At a very early age, I knew I didn't want to do what my dad did, which was work in an office.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: Parenting is an impossible job at any age.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: Sally Field looks amazing in general, never mind her age! She's a phenomenally talented actress and has had a career spanning so many decades.
name: Alison Sweeney

quote: I've had two romances since moving to Las Vegas. One was with somebody 12 years older than me, and the other was the same age, and neither worked out. I know people still think of me as one of Hugh Hefner's girlfriends, and he of course was much older than me, but that was a whole different lifestyle and a different kind of dating.
name: Holly Madison

quote: From age 16, I lived and breathed wine. I read every magazine and book about wine.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: IQ is a commodity, data is a commodity. I'm far more interested in watching people interact at a restaurant with their smartphone. We can all read 'Tech Crunch,' 'Ad Age.' I would rather be living in the trenches. I would rather be going to Whole Foods in Columbus Circle to watch people shop with their smartphones.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
name: Clive Bell

quote: I appreciate and enjoy my age.
name: Nikki Giovanni

quote: I've been going through photos of my mother, looking back on her life and trying to put it into context. Very few people age gracefully enough to be photographed through their aging.
name: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: I am rediscovering the whole sexual dimension of life at the age of 86, really. And that also means discovering the feminine. So the whole of this dimension, which I had been seeking for a very long time, is now sort of opening itself up to me.
name: Bede Griffiths

quote: I think all writers of my age who are brought up on films probably by the age of 16 have seen many more films than they have read classics of literature. We can't help but be influenced by film. Film has got some great tricks that it's taught writers.
name: David Mitchell

quote: Some broad themes brought me where I am today. At a very young age, my hobby became thinking and finding connections.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: I think you have to be a little bit strict. You can't be friend and their parent in a lot of situations, especially in this day and age where it's so dangerous for kids. So there's a bit of sternness, I guess, in the way I raise my kids.
name: Tim McGraw

quote: In the 1970s and 1980s there was so little decent fiction for young people, but we're now in a golden age that shows no sign of fading. Philip Pullman, J. K. Rowling, Lemony Snicket are only three of the best known among a good number of equals.
name: David Mitchell

quote: I want to sell to people my own age, because that's the way I write songs.
name: John Mellencamp

quote: You get to a certain age and you just want to prove that you can still rock - that you've still got it.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: I always thought that I might retire from any form of sexuality by the age of 40 and just become a dignified older person.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: It's only at this age that I can say the word 'art' without flinching.
name: Mira Nair

quote: Well, once you've resigned yourself to the fact that you are the more mature pop performer and you're past the age you ever thought you would do it, you might as well do it as long as you can. As long as I can still lift a microphone, then I'll do it, you know.
name: Jarvis Cocker

quote: I hope to have one more boxing match at the age of 55. Given that demographic at the age of 55 to 65, you've got to make a statement with your life. Otherwise, you are just existing.
name: George Foreman

quote: I think it's hard, the fact that there's a certain age that we can't have kids anymore.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: While I had often said that I wanted to die in bed, what I really meant was that in my old age I wanted to be stepped on by an elephant while making love.
name: Roger Zelazny

quote: I basically started playing violin at the age of six. That lasted about three years because my previous teacher died and the second teacher didn't really know how to successfully get me going.
name: Miroslav Vitous

quote: Age acquires no value save through thought and discipline.
name: James Truslow Adams

quote: I've had to be a man since I was 12 or 13. I had a job. And I was playing the piano for people twice my age. Handling responsibility is what makes a man a man.
name: Jamie Foxx

quote: Old age isn't so bad when you consider the alternative.
name: Maurice Chevalier

quote: Up until age 40, most men are just not as mature as women. So, it makes sense that a lot of women date up in age a bit.
name: Patti Stanger

quote: Think back to yourself at age 18. I know I was mighty different than the Patti I am today. As we grow up, we grow out of our haircuts, our apartments and - often times - our romantic decisions.
name: Patti Stanger

quote: I was well motivated. What I wanted to do was work for myself. I had twenty two jobs before I started my business at the age of twenty three and I didn't want one more boss telling me what to do. So I was motivated simply because I didn't want a boss.
name: Barbara Corcoran

quote: Regardless of age, regardless of position, regardless of the business we happen to be in, all of us need to understand the importance of branding. We are CEOs of our own companies: Me, Inc. To be in business today, our most important job is to be head marketer for the brand called You.
name: Tom Peters

quote: An age which is incapable of poetry is incapable of any kind of literature except the cleverness of a decadence.
name: Raymond Chandler

quote: I've always felt that sexuality is a really slippery thing. In this day and age, it tends to get categorized and labeled, and I think labels are for food. Canned food.
name: Michael Stipe

quote: There must be a law against forcing children to perform at an early age. Children should have a wonderful childhood. They should not be given too much responsibility.
name: Maria Callas

quote: Each age tries to form its own conception of the past. Each age writes the history of the past anew with reference to the conditions uppermost in its own time.
name: Frederick Jackson Turner

quote: People quit on jobs. They quit on marriages. They quit on school. There's an immediacy of this day and age that doesn't lend itself to being committed to anything.
name: Emily Blunt

quote: I nearly died of double bronchial pneumonia at the age of five.
name: Roger Moore

quote: The wonderful thing about age is that your knees don't work as well, you can't run down steps quite as easily and obviously you can't lift heavy weights. But your mind doesn't feel any different.
name: Roger Moore

quote: In a secular age, an authentic miracle must purport to be a hoax, in order to gain credit in the world.
name: Angela Carter

quote: But I think it's a little different in Europe, because 40 is really the best age for a woman. That's when we hit our peak and become this ripe fruit.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: My mother was 45 when she had me, so when I was in high school my parents were the same age as my friends' grandparents.
name: Jack White

quote: In the age of television, image becomes more important than substance.
name: S. I. Hayakawa

quote: Just call me a family man and an actor who digs his whole scene, side interests and all. Just say I feel mighty good at the ripe old age of 27.
name: Bobby Darin

quote: Maybe back in the day you didn't need to be the greatest looking to be on TV and you didn't need to speak the best, but in this day and age, I think you need to be the package. You need to look the part for your sponsors, you need to be able to speak the part for the media and to big CEOs.
name: Danica Patrick

quote: The culture of independent film criticism has totally gone down the drain and this seems to come with the territory of the consumer age that we are now living in.
name: Wim Wenders

quote: There are only three things that can kill a farmer: lightning, rolling over in a tractor, and old age.
name: Bill Bryson

quote: They say eyes clear with age.
name: Philip Larkin

quote: Growing up on stage, I was introduced to makeup at a young age and I will never forget the first time I tried on a L'Oreal Paris iconic lipstick - it was instant glamour and I've been hooked ever since.
name: Lea Michele

quote: I don't mind my age.
name: Heather Mills

quote: Despite what anti-aging ads say, growing older can be better. I feel better in my skin, 100 percent. You have greater effects of gravity, but the better sense of yourself you have is something I wouldn't trade. Women who lie about their age - 'why?'
name: Demi Moore

quote: For the moment I prefer to be a beautiful woman of my age than try desperately to look 30.
name: Demi Moore

quote: It's a little silly to finally learn how to write at this age. But I long ago realized I was secretly sincere.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: It's not always possible to sit down and eat at home in this day and age of fast-paced living, but if you are going to eat out, do so as a family and support all the great local places in your areas. I'll still eat at the same diner I did as a kid with my parents.
name: Michael Symon

quote: I worked hard in gymnastics since the time I was six years old until I retired at 23 years of age.
name: Nadia Comaneci

quote: I did successfully kick tobacco at the age of 34. I smoked for like 20 years, from 14 to 34.
name: Larry Hagman

quote: India saw from the beginning, and, even in her ages of reason and her age of increasing ignorance, she never lost hold of the insight, that life cannot be rightly seen in the sole light, cannot be perfectly lived in the sole power of its externalities.
name: Sri Aurobindo

quote: Back in the 1960s, I saw Peter, Paul and Mary. I was at that age, about 14, and I was mesmerized.
name: Lucinda Williams

quote: For me from a pretty young age up until about 21 years old hallucinogenics had a huge place in my life.
name: Jon Fishman

quote: A sense of freedom is something that, happily, comes with age and life experience.
name: Diane Keaton

quote: Writers obviously have to bear witness to the harsh face of the age.
name: Alexander McCall Smith

quote: Stop living a day at a time and stop worrying about age.
name: Helen Reddy

quote: Young women from a very young age are taught that life will be easier if you can just turn on the charming smile and say very little and be complacent and docile and sweet.
name: Amber Heard

quote: I started writing when I had three kids under the age of 4. I used to write every ten minutes I got to sit in front of a computer. Now, when I have more time, I function the same way: if it's writing time, I write.
name: Jodi Picoult

quote: I'm never overawed by a situation and I think that's because I've always looked several years older than I am. So because people were treating me like I was 40 when I was 29, I've always felt in control of a situation. People used to say, when you're 32, you'll look 32. I'm still waiting for that moment, where my age catches up with my appearance.
name: Chris O'Dowd

quote: I am 54 and age is slowly writing itself on my face.
name: Arthur Smith

quote: I envy the sensibility in Europe, appreciating beauty in women as they age. I'm going to go that way. I might dye my gray hair for a bit, but beyond that the buck stops. I'm not having any work done.
name: Rachel Bilson

quote: It was Julie Burchill who decreed that, beyond a certain age, a man should not be seen in a leather jacket.
name: Arthur Smith

quote: As a result of the digital age and the decline of first-class mail, there is no question that the Postal Service must change and develop a new business model.
name: Bernie Sanders

quote: I've watched my peers get better with age and hoped that would happen with me.
name: Bonnie Raitt

quote: I never wanted to do TV. I just did what I was trained to do through the Special Forces, and I've been doing that from a very young age.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: Here's a proposal, offered only partly in jest: no resident of the United States, whether born here or abroad, should get to be a citizen until age 18, at which time each such resident has to take a test.
name: Eric Liu

quote: Second to agriculture, humbug is the biggest industry of our age.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: When it comes down to it, it's about who you know, and who's a fan. It's about whether you're the right age, whether you're hot or not, whether the studio is into you or not.
name: Marlee Matlin

quote: Another principle is, the deepest affections of our hearts gather around some human form in which are incarnated the living thoughts and ideas of the passing age.
name: Matthew Simpson

quote: My acting career began at age three and my parents got me into it. I was in a McDonald's commercial.
name: Corey Feldman

quote: I think that age as a number is not nearly as important as health. You can be in poor health and be pretty miserable at 40 or 50. If you're in good health, you can enjoy things into your 80s.
name: Bob Barker

quote: I just yesterday returned from a trip where I photographed a woman with two children whom I photographed first when she was the age of the older of the two children.
name: Jock Sturges

quote: You live in a deranged age, more deranged that usual, because in spite of great scientific and technological advances, man has not the faintest idea of who he is or what he is doing.
name: Walker Percy

quote: To write a story about New York that only deals with people in your age and socioeconomic bracket, that feels dishonest to me. So much of New York comes from everyone bumping into each other.
name: Josh Radnor

quote: My mother inspired me to treat others as I would want to be treated regardless of age, race or financial status.
name: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: And from the first time I picked up a basketball at age eight - I had a lot of difficulty when I first picked up a basketball, because I was a scrub - there were things that I liked about it.
name: Julius Erving

quote: Right up until the time I retired at age 37, I felt like there were still things that I could do better.
name: Julius Erving

quote: In 1981, at age 31, I was voted the best player in basketball, and the most valuable player in the league.
name: Julius Erving

quote: The great thing about arriving at this age is that I don't even care about my career anymore.
name: Ron Perlman

quote: Almost all of your life is lived by the seat of your pants, one unexpected event crashing into another, with no pattern or reason, and then you finally reach a point, around my age, where you spend more time than ever looking back. Why did this happen? Look where that led? You see the shape of things.
name: Ron Perlman

quote: I've always been intrigued by color and by interesting hair. I was one of those weird little girls doing my own hair at the age of 9. I was, like, getting weird gels and new brushes and cornrow holders. I would tweak and perm at the age of 13.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: There are no college courses to build up self-esteem or high school or elementary school. If you don't get those values at a early age, nurtured in your home, you don't get them.
name: T. D. Jakes

quote: The freethinking of one age is the common sense of the next.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: If children are not introduced to music at an early age, I believe something fundamental is actually being taken from them.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: Middle age is when your broad mind and narrow waist begin to change places.
name: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: As an American, you have a right to good health care that is effective, accessible, and affordable, that serves you from infancy through old age, that allows you to go to practitioners and facilities of your choosing, and that offers a broad range of therapeutic options.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: Women would be disproportionately affected by the privatization of social security. It is one of the most important safety nets for American women in old age, or in times of disability, to insure financial income for their families.
name: Barbara Mikulski

quote: Low levels of vitamin D in the population as a whole suggest that most people need to take a vitamin D supplement. This may be especially true for seniors, as the ability to synthesize vitamin D in the skin declines with age.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: Part of the reason I sort of shot out like a cannon out of Michigan and left home at such an early age is because I had to feel independent.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: I think that everyone at any age should ask themselves, 'where do I want to be today, where do I want to be tomorrow, and where do I want to be in a hundred years?' We all have clear answers to those questions. We only have so much time. It's a real shame if we don't spend our lives trying to do that.
name: Jack Antonoff

quote: My parents got married late and they had kids late, so I never felt a social or cultural thing to be married or pregnant or a homeowner by a certain age.
name: Anna Kendrick

quote: I'm a pretty big dork. It's crazy. I'm one of those people who grew up with all kinds of musicals, but I was right at that age where 'Rent' was a big deal for me and for my friends.
name: Anna Kendrick

quote: My parents were really, really cool about supporting what I wanted to do at a really young age. I think I was about 10 when I caught the bug. They would drive me down to New York if there were auditions. When I was 12, I did this show on Broadway called 'High Society,' so we moved to New York for the run of that.
name: Anna Kendrick

quote: I was very sexual from a very young age.
name: Portia de Rossi

quote: It is a sobering thought that when Mozart was my age, he had been dead for two years.
name: Tom Lehrer

quote: And I'm not as young as I once was. At my age, I don't have time to be bored.
name: Lev Grossman

quote: I was drafted into the Army when I was 19 and came out at age 22. Most people that I knew didn't think they'd come home alive. I didn't think I would either, so I was happy when I did.
name: Ed Koch

quote: One already feels like an anachronism, writing novels in the age of what-ever-this-is-the-age-of, but touring to promote them feels doubly anachronistic. The marketplace is showing an increasing intolerance for the time-honored practice of printing information on paper and shipping it around the country.
name: Lev Grossman

quote: To own the dominant, or only, newspaper in a mid-sized American city was, for many decades, a kind of license to print money. In the Internet age, however, no one has figured out how to rescue the newspaper in the United States or abroad.
name: Eric Alterman

quote: I grew up loving horses. I was relatively obsessed, starting with my rocking horse at age 2, all the way through my painting and drawing phase.
name: Diane Lane

quote: I was equally in love with singing and acting from an early age.
name: Minnie Driver

quote: You can construct the character of a man and his age not only from what he does and says, but from what he fails to say and do.
name: Norman Douglas

quote: I never played much golf as a kid. I caddied quite a bit but never got serious into golf until about age 15.
name: Lee Trevino

quote: These days too many of us seem inclined to cover our ears, close our eyes, and blindly follow the most narrow, conservative tenets of religion or else seek comfort in the ancient traditions of New Age ritual.
name: Joan D. Vinge

quote: There is no age, height, or weight requirement to skate. It is good exercise no matter what your age is. If you want to be competitive, most start young. But, I practice with many adult competitors.
name: Nancy Kerrigan

quote: I remember when I was 6 years old and my brother used to go seek out guys that were 13 to come over and play football against me while he was the 'permanent quarterback.' I didn't know exactly what the age difference was, but I was already playing against older guys.
name: Junior Seau

quote: Well, my son really loves wildlife. And everytime he draws a polar bear I want to tell him there probably won't any by the time... he's my age. That's kinda hard to deal with.
name: Thom Yorke

quote: To be perfectly honest, I think that as I'm growing older, I'm just growing more impatient. I'll be very happy if at some point people say, 'Michael's grown wiser and softer in his old age.' But we'll have to wait and see what my next project is.
name: Michael Haneke

quote: A woman my age is not supposed to be attractive or sexually appealing. I just get kinda tired of that.
name: Kathleen Turner

quote: Listen, in England people are already writing their memoirs at the age of 23.
name: Rupert Everett

quote: I was apprehensive. I feared every time I talked about poetry, it would be filtered through the lens of race, sex, and age.
name: Rita Dove

quote: Everyone takes pause at 40. It's the age you have to assess everything in your life. It's the fictitious marker that's always coming up when you're young. The world really does look at you to kind of have it together by 40, and be successful by 40. Whatever success means.
name: Paul Feig

quote: I started out modeling at a young age and surrounded myself with different brilliant minds. I have so many people to get educated from, and I've been a sponge.
name: Kellan Lutz

quote: People say women shouldn't have long hair over a certain age, but I've never done what everyone says.
name: Jane Seymour

quote: We tend to think of age only in time, but I don't think it has much to do with time at all there's a whole load of other things. I've met 16-year-olds who are old and 90-year-olds who are young.
name: Roger Daltrey

quote: It looks good when you see someone kicking at the age of 51 with no double. It's kinda cool for people to know that past 50 we can keep flexible.
name: Jean Claude Van Damme

quote: The second album was emotionally exhausting and my life felt like it had become very serious at a very young age.
name: Delta Goodrem

quote: I never felt totally, 100%, patriotically English... I'd seen a lot of the world by an early age - sort of spent a lot of time traveling around Lebanon and I'd seen Babylon, and Damascus, and all sorts of places in the Middle East by the time I was ten. Then we'd return to Ruslip in West London... Done a fair bit of traveling really.
name: Andy Serkis

quote: The first feminine feature that goes, with advancing age, is the neck.
name: Gloria Swanson

quote: You just never know when you're living in a golden age.
name: Alexander Payne

quote: We now have an opportunity, though, to do something we didn't do in the industrial age, and that is to get a leg up on this, to bring the public in quickly, to have an informed debate.
name: Jeremy Rifkin

quote: I've spent as much as 30 grand on a watch but it's not about flaunting my wealth. I don't have many extravagances but watches are my biggest one. I must have 30 of them now. I've been collecting since the age of nine, when I won a black TAG in a karting event.
name: Jenson Button

quote: We were making the first step out of the age of chemistry and physics, and into the age of biology.
name: Jeremy Rifkin

quote: I feel like women are asked their age more than men.
name: Kristen Wiig

quote: Even in this day and age, if you're not married, there are people who are like, 'Awww! Don't worry, it'll happen for you someday.'
name: Kristen Wiig

quote: For students today, only 10 percent of children from working-class families graduate from college by the age of 24 as compared to 58 percent of upper-middle-class and wealthy families.
name: Patrick J. Kennedy

quote: I have worked very hard on being aware of my childhood but moving forward and not letting it bring me down emotionally. That is a hard thing - especially when you have children of your own and you remember what happened to you at that age.
name: Samantha Morton

quote: Traveling to Russia and Germany and being able to see the world at a young age was really cool for me, and I really liked that.
name: Mia Wasikowska

quote: I vividly remember being 14. That was the age when I started to get happy: I started being a writer and stopped being a loser.
name: Anthony Horowitz

quote: The balance of private good and general welfare is at the bottom of civilized morals but the morals of the Heroic Age are founded on individuality, and on nothing else.
name: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: I also find it interesting that a lot of people in their 30s are not married and don't have kids. There are a lot of people in this age bracket that are out there dating and trying to find love. And I never thought that at my age I would be.
name: John Stamos

quote: The reason can only be this: heroic poetry depends on an heroic age, and an age is heroic because of what it is, not because of what it does.
name: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: The 19th century was the age of Individualism the 20th and 21st are the ages of Socialism.
name: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: We live in an age of mediocrity.
name: Lauren Bacall

quote: I gambled and I lost. I failed in securing my options for this choice for myself, but I succeeded in verifying the Dark Age is still with us.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I always looked really young for my age. And once I hit 23, 24 and 25, I was then allowed to play the cool 18-year-olds and stuff.
name: Ben Barnes

quote: I want to be age appropriate. I don't want to be that girl you see walking away and she looks 25 and then she turns around and she looks 90.
name: Stevie Nicks

quote: When I was at school, I was in choirs more than anything else, from a very young age, about 9 years old. And then I started taking drum lessons.
name: Ben Barnes

quote: I was always obsessed with being famous. I had Marilyn Monroe paper dolls as a child, and I was always obsessed with her. I've just been really driven in that direction, and none of my friends were. So, I don't know what put that bug in me at a young age.
name: Holly Madison

quote: All my early school reports from the age of 5 were 'Daniel must learn not to distract others.'
name: Dan Stevens

quote: At the age of 11 I was about 6 ft. tall and my voice had completely broken. That caused problems. I was this gangly, spotty, very unattractive kid. I wasn't cool and I wasn't a nerd. I didn't even want to fit in with anyone.
name: Dan Stevens

quote: I've always tried to do my very best, and I want to be the very best age, whatever age I am.
name: Ann-Margret

quote: I never quite toed the line. I was a bit disruptive. All my early school reports from the age of 5 were 'Daniel must learn not to distract others.' And now, that's what I do for a living.
name: Dan Stevens

quote: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Men of my age live in a state of continual desperation.
name: Vita Sackville-West

quote: Starting a new retirement plan for those below a certain age is something tens of millions of Americans have already been through at work.
name: Mitch Daniels

quote: Anybody under the age of forty knows hip-hop, gospel and R&ampB pretty well, and it's all a part of what we consider to be 'black music.' There is a natural synergy between the three.
name: John Legend

quote: Well, Jeff Buckley for me is one of the greatest singers I've ever heard. And the reason why is he has an amazing range, amazing emotional power in his voice. And the music he put around it also just had this passion and this soul to it and this spirit to it that very few artists have, and he passed at a very young age.
name: John Legend

quote: It's getting better generally, daily, especially in TV, for women in acting and age and looks count less. As more women come into the business. Change of any sort takes a long time to happen.
name: Julie Walters

quote: I think the most exciting thing is that you expect people our age to know the music, but actually a lot of kids know the music, and if anything is left, we have left really good music, and that's the important part, not the mop-tops or whatever.
name: Ringo Starr

quote: It doesn't matter what color, sex, religion, age, sexual orientation, etc., everyone should have the same freedoms and liberties.
name: Lance Bass

quote: Childhood itself is scarcely more lovely than a cheerful, kindly, sunshiny old age.
name: Lydia M. Child

quote: In my older age, I've learned to take things slower, because I used to be that total-fall-in-love-after-a-day guy.
name: Lance Bass

quote: You watch yourself age and it's hard to feel like a sex symbol.
name: Idris Elba

quote: I like to be alone so I can write. But focus can hurt you. I don't want to be some stress casualty in early middle age.
name: James Ellroy

quote: I'd always thought the Rats were good fun, but one of the very nice things about being of Saga age is that I can actually look back and think, When I was younger I was in a great band. It was always a collective thing.
name: Bob Geldof

quote: I do think I feel it but you don't think you are cause at a certain time you are no age but you don't think you are anything. You feel the life you have lived. I feel that. It's been a long fifty years.
name: Bob Geldof

quote: The crucial task of old age is balance: keeping just well enough, just brave enough, just gay and interested and starkly honest enough to remain a sentient human being.
name: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quote: My first job was in retail at the age of 14, and I have worked in the industry ever since.
name: Rachel Roy

quote: I believed my story would be helpful to young women my daughter's age, who are still in the process of forming themselves as women, and in need of encouragement to remain true to themselves.
name: Joyce Maynard

quote: Old age and sickness bring out the essential characteristics of a man.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: We hold that the most wonderful and splendid proof of genius is a great poem produced in a civilized age.
name: Thomas B. Macaulay

quote: The age we live in is a busy age in which knowledge is rapidly advancing towards perfection.
name: Jeremy Bentham

quote: In a spiritually sensitive culture, then, it might well be that age is something to be admired or envied.
name: Rowan D. Williams

quote: What though youth gave love and roses, Age still leaves us friends and wine.
name: Thomas More

quote: If there is anything I would do differently in my life, it is that I would study business more. I'm trying to teach my daughter Chloe at an early age about investing and money so she's not afraid of it.
name: Donna Mills

quote: Any young man who is unmarried at the age of twenty one is a menace to the community.
name: Brigham Young

quote: Time, in general, has always been a central obsession of mine - what it does to people, how it can constitute a plot all on its own. So naturally, I am interested in old age.
name: Anne Tyler

quote: The first crocodile I ever caught was at nine years of age, and it was a rescue.
name: Steve Irwin
